author: linsun
msg: GERONIMO-4461 GERONIMO-4466 improve heuristic exceptions during tx manager commit

author: mikemccand
msg: LUCENE-1493: allow setting top number of hits to collect with search.num.hits

author: tellison
msg: Remove bind2 native and just use bind.
The 'bindToDevice' parameter is passed around, but ultimately ignored.  Keeping it around now in case we need it, but its also a candidate for removal.
Reordered the param list for bind to be a bit more intuitive.

author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-333: Added methods and constructors that allow to set up the namespace context of an AXIOMXPath using an OMElement. The implementation follows the same rules as XSLT.
